newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Q2 GDP growth at 5.42 pct yr/yr - official.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Q2 GDP growth at 5.42 pct yr/yr - official.

text.p: Taiwan's gross domestic product grew 5.42 percent in the second quarter compared to a revised 5.12 percent in the first quarter, the Directorate General of Budget, Accounting and Statistics said on Friday.
The directorate forecast that GDP growth for the entire year would reach 5.89 percent, well below an prediction of 6.17 percent issued three months ago.
Second-quarter GDP growth also came in significantly lower than a May projection of 6.05 percent.
The directorate on Friday revised downward its forecast for the third quarter but was more optimistic about the fourth.
It said third quarter growth would be 6.09 percent, lower than May's 6.59 percent forecast, while fourth quarter growth would hit 6.86 percent, better than May's forecast of 6.68 percent.
